title.rendered: Brian Burt of Amazon Influencer Marketing

content.rendered:
Amazon marketing is more than just selling more units. Using Amazon influencer marketing has shown to boost listings so they rank on page one and can double or triple your reviews. Brian has offered Amazing FBA listeners an incredible deal. 50% off his course!
If it is currently out beyond your budget, be sure to check out his free content on YouTube.

219 Amazon Influencer Marketing with Brian Burt Part 1

We’ll be talking about Amazon influencer marketing with Brian Burt. He’ll be talking about how to get free promotion from utilizing micro-influencers on social media!

220 Amazon Marketing Free Strategies with Brian Burt Part 2 

We are finishing the interview with Brian Burt of Amazon Influencer Marketing. He had been giving some really good information that you can implement right now at no cost. We’re talking effective Amazon marketing at no cost.
